section-starting-page.title: Welcome to Qodana
section-starting-page.description: These topics will help you get started with Qodana.

a.description: Qodana is a code quality monitoring platform that brings into your CI/CD pipelines all the smart features you love in the JetBrains IDEs as well as project-level checks like clone detection and license audit.
Learn how to get started with Qodana in a few simple steps
The Qodana IntelliJ linter lets you perform static analysis of your codebase.
Qodana Clone Finder compares a queried project against a number of reference projects and lists all duplicate functions ranked by their importance.
Qodana License Audit helps software projects avoid problems with incompatible third-party licenses.
Qodana runs are configured via the `qodana.yaml` configuration file.
View the Qodana run results in the browser
Configure the Qodana IntelliJ Docker image
